attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all chemicals are harmful to the human body and more and more people are developing illness's because of them my son included.To add any chemical to drinking water is irresposible.Before these desisions are made the ministers should speak to people whose lives have been affected by chemicals which might just make them think again
